actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend subtitle B of the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to permit the consolidation of operating loans under such subtitle.

summary.text: Permits small farmers and ranchers to consolidate operating loans made by the Secretary of Agriculture under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend subtitle B of the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to permit the consolidation of operating loans under such subtitle.
